title: Images of an Era The American Poster 1945-1975, Exhibition Poster for The Grey Art Gallery, and Study Center, New York University
provenance: From the collection of Dan Friedman
medium: Offset lithograph on white wove paper
description: Red and white squares that contain, and are also formed by, the letters that make up the exhibition title are shown against a blue background.   Below in black, the name and address of the Gallery, dates and sponsors.
name: Poster
